name: Travel Nest
description: Developed a MERN-based hotel booking platform featuring role-based functionalities (User, Host, Admin), secure Firebase JWT authentication, and integrated payment methods. Utilized a robust tech stack for an enhanced user experience, including front-end libraries and a feature-rich admin dashboard with statistical insights. The system ensures secure and seamless transactions while allowing Admins to efficiently manage users and permissions.

name: Vista Forum
description: The forum website boasts a well-structured architecture with key features such as user authentication, dynamic content loading, user profile management, an admin dashboard with privileged access, and interactive content creation capabilities.

name: Study Circle Project
description: React-based front-end routing configuration using react-router-dom, facilitating seamless navigation and authentication for an educational platform with features such as assignment creation, tracking, and detailed assignment views.

name: Reef Techno
description: This is tech shop related project. A comprehensive tech shop project that offers a range of features to enhance your online shopping experience.
